mapper.select:
select i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, im.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount as price from items i left JOIN items_img im on im.item_id = i.id LEFT JOIN (select item_id,MIN(price_discount) as price_discount from items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) tempSpec on tempSpec.item_id = i.id where im.is_main = 1
and i.item_name like '%${paramsMap.keywords}%'
order by
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc
